wiki.content:
"I Wanna Dance with Somebody (Who Loves Me)" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart, U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart and the U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Summer of 1987.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "I Wanna Dance with Somebody (Who Loves Me)" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart, U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart and the U.S. Billboard Adult Contemporary Chart in the Summer of 1987.

track.name: I Wanna Dance With Somebody (Who Loves Me)
comments: GREAT song :) [2]
I wanna feel the heat with somebody!
Flashbacks of dancing in my bedroom!
This is a lot longer than I remember.
nice
GREAT song :)

Somebody, OOOH! Somebody, OOOH!
Please vote for this as the correct tag! :)
This is the right tag

My dear, I remember I was just a little child and I suddenly saw you on TV singing this song, dancing so happy in this video full of color and happiness and I fell in love with you, I can't believe you're gone, this song is part of my life and you too, hope to see you someday and I'm sure you'll find peace but I'm still in tears and trying to understand.
